content.raw:
Sorry for arriving a bit late to the party.

@traversaro yes, the creation of a common package for all our cmake stuff is in my list of priorities, in the top of my letter to Santa Claus. ign-cmake-modules (ala ros-cmake-modules) would be really nice to have. Something still to happen.

The whole PR looks good to me. I've been able to use it to install into /usr and compile sdformat without a problem. Install it into /tmp/foo and compile sdformat via CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH. And after installing it in /tmp/foo move it to /tmp/snake and sdformat still compiles without problems.

So green light, really nice contribution Silvio, thanks very much.
